Public Member Functions

Detailed Description

This interface must be implemented for each IrrODE event listener.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool irr::ode::IIrrOdeEventListener::handlesEvent ( IIrrOdeEvent *  pEvent  )  [pure virtual]

This method is called to see whether or not an event is handled by this listener

Parameters:
pEvent the event in question
Returns:
"true" if the listener handles the event, "false" otherwise
